name: NOODLEHEAD
description:
Noodlehead, the new full length album is now available. The album concept and artwork is the first installment in an ongoing collaboration between architect Al Shissias and Jon LaDeau.

It features:
JL on guitar and vocals
Taylor Floreth on drums
James Preston on bass and vocals 

Special guests include:
Justin Kimmel on guitar and vocals
Colin Brown on piano, organ, and clavinet
Jeff Malinowski on guitar and vocals
Peter Barr on steel drums
Paul Lefevbre on pedal steel guitar  

This is an electric album with plenty of attitude.  It starts off in Noodlehead's wild years as a hard partying, pool shooting, motorcycle riding dude.  Over the course of ten songs, the sound mellows slightly, ending on the beach in Coney Island with the sound of steel drums and acoustic guitars.  

There is a lot of singing and guitar playing on this record.  It was a lot of fun to make and I hope you have as much fun sharing it with your friends as I did recording it with mine.

JL


ALL ORDERS WILL SHIP WITHIN 24 HOURS AND INCLUDE A FREE DOWNLOAD.

name: Jon LaDeau LP (Digital Copy)
description:
The Physical copies of the May 2012 LP are SOLD OUT! It is still available in digital format.  Order now and receive an immediate download. 

Jon LaDeau - Songs, Vocals, Guitar
Taylor Floreth - Drums
Scott Metzger - Lead Guitar
Jon Shaw - Bass, Piano
Kelli Scarr - Vocals 
James Preston - Vocals 

Recorded, Mixed, and Mastered by D James Goodwin at the Isokon.  Woodstock, NY.

Additional Recording by Dan Chen in Brooklyn, NY.

Cover Photo by M.H. Froidevaux

name: Jon LaDeau TRIO - Breaking Down LP
description:
Released April 2009.  All orders receive FREE shipping in the U.S. and a thank you note from Jon.

JL - Guitar, Mandolin, Piano, Vocals
David Butler - Drums, Vocals
Mark Karwan - Bass, Vocals

Buford O'Sullivan - Trombone
Justin LaDeau - Organ

Recorded and Mixed by Brian Toll and Jon LaDeau
Mastered by Dwight Arkansas

Album design and photography by Jesse Kuhn at rawtoastdesign.com
